name: 2023 the 8th International Conference on Control, Robotics and Cybernetics
content: Publication: All submitted papers must be written in English. Accepted papers will be published in CRC 2023 Conference Proceedings. The proceedings will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series, which will be published and submitted to Xplore. Those papers will be submitted for indexing to Ei Compendex and Scopus.
